item.title: Master-Thesis
item.description: After a challenging year I finally defended my master thesis on “VM Selection for Financial Exchanges in the Cloud”. This collaborative effort was done as my master’s degree final credit at my alma mater the Technical University of Munich. Throughout this work I was by co-advised by PhD. Muhammad Haseeeb and Dr.Anirudh Sivaraman from Systems@NYU, as well as PhD. Navidreza Asadi and Prof. Dr.-Ing. Wolfgang Kellerer from LKN at TUM. The entirety of the code and relevant documentation can be found on github.
